title.narrative: Local Development Program Support Project II

description.narrative: The Project Development Objectives for PROADEL-2 are: (i) improved access to basic infrastructure and social services in targeted districts; and (ii) improved planning, management and monitoring by local communities and communes of decentralized investments.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article 5, 5.01 (b) | Description :PIM; Project Administrative, Financial and Accounting Manual; and the M&EManual have been updated to reflect the Project design features and implementation procedures | Due Date :30-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I | Description :Recruitment of a Project Coordinator, an FMS, an M&E Specialist, a CentralAccountant, a Procurement Specialist and an internal auditor (central and regional level) | Due Date :30-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B. 4 | Description :The annual audits performed, shall include spot checks of thephysical existence of micro-project activities on a sample basis. | Due Date :31-Jan-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.A.3 (a) | Description :The Recipient shall carry out and furnish to the Association, atechnical audit of the quality of the micro-project activities and expenditures on a sample basis, 2 months prior to MTR | Due Date:29-Nov-2013
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V, A (b) | Description :The Recipient has made the initial contribution into the ProjectAccount | Due Date :30-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V, A | Description :Recipient shall (a) open & maintain a Project Acct in CFAF in a comm.bank satisfactory to IDA; (b) within 6 months of effectvnss deposit CFAF2.5 b in Proj. Acct. (c) deposit 2.5 b each semester | DueDate :30-Sep-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V, B. | Description :Project funds transfer to a LPMU when LPMU is established; LPMU openeda segregated account in a commercial bank. | Due Date :30-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V, C | Description :The Recipient has employed the independent auditors which shall conductthe audits | Due Date :31-Jan-2013
